dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions[type]
dt-option.summary: The object structure for additional conditions for SearchBuilder

type.description: An array of objects that contain the information necessary to add a new condition.

dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows custom conditions to be added to SearchBuilder should the standard ones not be enough.
This object contains 8 properties.
* `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].display` The string that is to be displayed in the option for this condition. Also what it is referred to throughout. * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].comparator` This is the function that compares the row data and the value selected in this criteria. * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].joiner` This optional property is the text that will be displayed if there is more than one value required for the condition. * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].updateOn` This property is a string that contains the events occuring on the value element that should trigger a search. * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].active` This function is used to determine if the criteria should be used in the overall filter * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].get` This function is used to return the value that the values from the table should be compared against * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].init` This function is used to initialise the vlaue element * `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].set` This function is used to populate an element if that is required
